testcase.classname: As a Test Engineer I want to be able to create simple scenarios.
testcase.name: Navigate to the Link Page
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to Link Page............................................passed Then user should verify the page is opened correctly........................passed

testcase.classname: As a Test Engineer I want to be able to create simple scenarios.
testcase.name: Check Age page functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Age Page............................................passed When User enter name : "Nancy"..............................................passed And User enter age : 29.....................................................passed And Click on Submit button..................................................passed Then User see message : "Hello, Nancy, you are an adult"....................passed
